result.execSummary:
Scott Mitchell Peterson was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Scott Mitchell Peterson was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott Mitchell Peterson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: of Extradition signed by def and HWC on this date. sf

CO: Cameron, RPR: Drost, Clerk: Webb ADA: Sharon Ann Correll, DF ATTY: Joseph Caton Jr., DF:  Scott Mitchell Peterson appeared from jail. Court called at 4:26 p.m.  DE is requesting extradition to Dakota County Minnesota.  Court informs DE of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Court and DE sign Waiver of Extradition.  Court adjourned at 4:30 p.m. lw
